scripts.coverage:sandbox: coverage-tests create-tests && yarn test:coverage && coverage-tests process-report
scripts.coverage:prod: coverage-tests create-tests && yarn test:coverage && coverage-tests process-report --send-report prod
scripts.test:coverage: docker run --env APPLITOOLS_SHOW_LOGS=true --env APPLITOOLS_API_KEY="$APPLITOOLS_API_KEY_SDK" --env APPLITOOLS_BATCH_NAME='JS Coverage Tests: eyes-testcafe' --env APPLITOOLS_BATCH_ID=$(uuidgen) -v $(pwd):/tests -w /tests -it testcafe/testcafe chromium test/coverage/generic
scripts.test:coverage:local: APPLITOOLS_BATCH_NAME='JS Coverage Tests: eyes-testcafe' APPLITOOLS_BATCH_ID=$(uuidgen) testcafe $BROWSER test/coverage/generic --reporter spec,xunit:coverage-test-report.xml
scripts.test:coverage:local:debug: APPLITOOLS_BATCH_NAME='JS Coverage Tests: eyes-testcafe' APPLITOOLS_BATCH_ID=$(uuidgen) testcafe $BROWSER test/coverage/generic --reporter spec,xunit:coverage-test-report.xml --inspect-brk
scripts.preversion: bongo preversion && yarn test && yarn coverage:prod
